question: I am a Conductoid. I can absorb any kind of energy through my plugs and shoot it back. I am Ben's favorite. Who am I?
I look like I am made of building blocks. I can stretch, fold, and rebuild my body into cages or walls. Who am I?
I am a living planetoid. I can manipulate gravity to make things heavy or light, or create an orbit. Who am I?
I have powerful legs that let me jump immense distances. My skull is hard enough to smash through rocks. Who am I?
I am a small beetle. I spit plasma goo that I roll into a ball, which explodes upon impact. Who am I?
I am a slippery fish with legs. I have no real attacks, but I am very hard to catch because I am so slippery. Who am I?
I look like a fairy. I can put enemies to sleep with my dust and manipulate their dreams for information. Who am I?
I am a mole with a magnificent mustache. I can shape my mustache into hands, propellers, or fists. Who am I?
I am indestructible but I feel every bit of pain. I am considered the 'worst' alien to use in a fight. Who am I?
I am a chicken-hawk fighter. I have powerful kicks and sharp talons, and I am a master of hand-to-hand combat. Who am I?
I have a jetpack on my back and energy whips. I squawk when I talk and fly through the sky. Who am I?
I am an Incursean. I have a long tongue and powerful legs. I used this form to infiltrate Emperor Milleous's ship. Who am I?
I am Ben's second most powerful alien. I can create nuclear energy and shout 'HAME-NA HAME-NA!' when I attack. Who am I?
I am a living chemical factory. I can mix gases in my stomach to create laughing gas, tear gas, or glue. Who am I?
I am a Vladat from the Anur System. I can hypnotize enemies with my corrupturas but I burn in sunlight. Who am I?
I am not an Omnitrix transformation, but a Slimebiote who attached to the Omnitrix to give Ben weapons. Who am I?
I returned in Omniverse with a yellow and black suit and a Canadian accent. I control electricity. Who am I?
I am a fusion of Alien X and Atomix created by Ben 10,000 using the Biomnitrix. Who am I?
I am a Biomnitrix fusion of Crashhopper and Shocksquatch. I jump and shock at the same time! Who am I?
I am a fusion of Upgrade and Juryrigg. I don't just upgrade tech, I frantically rebuild it! Who am I?
I am a fusion of Way Big and Upchuck. I am huge, but I can still eat energy and spit it out. Who am I?
I am a fusion of Humungousaur and Goop. I am a giant dinosaur, but I am made of sticky slime. Who am I?
I am a fusion of Four Arms and Humungousaur. I have massive muscles and pure brute strength. Who am I?
